examples.example: 当我站在山顶看到那壮丽的景色时，心中充满了震撼与喜悦。

translate.english: When I stood on the top of the mountain and saw that magnificent scenery, my heart was filled with shock and joy.

examples.example: 每次看到五星红旗在风中飘扬，我心中就涌起一股强烈的自豪感。

translate.english: Every time I see the Five-starred Red Flag fluttering in the wind, a strong sense of pride wells up in my heart.

examples.example: 我看到街边绽放的花朵，顿感生活如此美好。

translate.english: I saw the blossoming flowers on the street side, and suddenly felt that life is so beautiful.
